select * from( select rownum rnum, data.* from( select num, name, subject, email, hitCount, ipAddr, to_char(created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created from board where $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%' order by num desc) data)
where rnum >= #start# and rnum <= #end#
select num, name, pwd, email, subject, content, ipAddr, hitcount, created from board where num = #num#
sqlMap.update: update board set hitCount = hitCount +1 where num = #num#
